text.quote: 000: Clause 86, page 59, line 15, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “( ) initiate and intervene in legal proceedings, including proceedings under section 7 of the Human Rights Act 1998 where the Children’s Commissioner is not the victim or potential victim of the unlawful act to which the proceedings relate;”

text.quote: 000: Clause 93, page 63, line 37, at end insert—
“( ) A child is within this subsection if he or she is detained in pursuance of—
text.IndentOne: (a) an order made by a court, or
(b) an order of recall made by the Secretary of State.
text.quote: ( ) A child is within this subsection if he or she has been identified by a professional as a potential victim of trafficking.
( ) A child is within this subsection if he or she is a aspirated migrant child.”
